original_text: Makir's wife Maakah had a son and she called him Peresh. Peresh's brother was Sheresh and Sheresh's sons were Ulam and Rekem.
korean_text: 마길의 아내 마아가는 아들을 낳아 그의 이름을 베레스라 하였으며 그의 아우의 이름은 세레스이며 세레스의 아들들은 울람과 라겜이요

sentences.original_text: Makir's wife Maakah had a son
and Sheresh's sons were Ulam and Rekem.
